definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
Adam Smith (1723-1790), Scottish ethical philosopher and pioneer economist, author of The Wealth of Nations 國富論|国富论
Adamstown, capital of the Pitcairn Islands

sentences.english: Creative Adam and Eve inspired blanket cover for your bed.
sentences.chinese: 受亞當和夏娃所啓發的創意毛毯牀罩。
我們應該把他叫做亞當。

sentences.english: After Seth was born, Adam lived 800 years and had other sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 亞當生塞特之後，又在世八百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: Adams said no more, but he placed a new photo on his desk.
sentences.chinese: 亞當斯沒有多說什麼，他放了一張照片在他桌上。

sentences.english: Adam's daughter called from the wash-up.
sentences.chinese: 亞當的女兒在浴室叫喊。

sentences.english: Hello ? My name 's Tom Harris. Is Adam there, please?
sentences.chinese: 喂？我叫湯姆哈利斯。請問亞當在嗎？

sentences.english: Adam is your average working-class guy living in small-town America.
sentences.chinese: 亞當是普通工薪階層的人生活在美國的一個小鎮。

sentences.english: Adem, how much has it helped having fellow countrymen Nemanja Vidic and Zoran at the club?
sentences.chinese: 亞當，同胞維迪奇和託西奇對你有幫助嗎？

sentences.english: Bdam had a job at a call center during his college years.
sentences.chinese: 亞當大學時代曾在某家電話客服中心工作過。

sentences.english: I know he's excited for Adam. Proud even.
sentences.chinese: 其實我知道他爲亞當而興奮，甚至自豪。

sentences.english: Adam looked after my house while I was gone.
sentences.chinese: 我不在的時候，亞當替我看房子。

sentences.english: Adams retired to his farm in Quincy.
sentences.chinese: 亞當斯退休後回到了昆西的農場。

sentences.english: Becky was well-behaved at school but Adam was naughty.
sentences.chinese: 貝基在學校很守規矩，但是亞當很調皮。

sentences.english: Maybe Adam Guettel, but he supports drilling.
sentences.chinese: 亞當葛特或許能與之一較高低，但他支持演練。

sentences.english: Adam and Eve played the first game of hide and seek.
sentences.chinese: 亞當和夏娃是“躲貓貓”遊戲的鼻祖。

sentences.english: Adam named his wife Eve, because she would become the mother of all the living.
sentences.chinese: 亞當給他妻子起名叫夏娃，因爲她是衆生之母。

definition: Roth (name)/Kenneth Roth (1955-), executive director of Human Rights Watch 人權觀察|人权观察[Ren2 quan2 Guan1 cha2]
to play tricks on/to make fun of/to tease
Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
